file_content.text: My--my lord. What happened? How did you--?
We never met anybody who could do what you did. Not Lord Paladius, not anybody.
If you wish to serve me, go to the Strell House. My servants will see that you are brought into the fold.
Are you looking to convert?
The Strell House--a good place, that. Daegin Strell was a good man.
Worship me, or the next display of power will be your last.
Bow or else!
That was only a small fraction of the power I possess.
It was nothing.
Of course, my lord. We are most unworthy.
But before you send us away--share your wisdom and strength with us, so we can serve you.
There is only passion. Through passion, strength. Through strength, power. Through power, victory.
Peace is a lie.
That's the same line Paladius fed us! I'm sick of these Sith games.
Shut your mouth. The Sith speaks the truth!
I want to wear robes of solid gold!
Bring me presents!
You're just as crazy as Paladius!
Shut your mouth before the Sith fries us!
You heard the Sith! Pass the hat around, and don't be stingy!
Hm. Not really enough for a solid gold anything, but it's all we got--at least until we find more followers.
Don't worry about it. You've done well.
It'll do.
You are most generous, my lord, but you deserve to have those robes.
I suppose I could settle for silk.
Sigh.
No, my lord shouldn't settle.
We'll spread your message around Nar Shaddaa, see if we can't collect more.
If I find out that even one of you kept a single credit for himself, you will all suffer!
Fools!
Y--yes, my lord. I'm sure no one would be so greedy as that.
We--we'll go find more converts. Rich ones. You'll get your robes, my lord. Promise.
Forgive those who hurt you. Love and respect all, and you will bring honor to yourselves as well as to me.
Be kind.
You're nothing like Paladius or anything I ever heard of.
You're crazy! What will forgiveness get us? Ten more years in the gutter that's what.
It's not as if we got any higher up under Paladius. The gutter's the gutter.
Besides, this one does what he says--he cured the Rot.
Besides, this one does what she says--she cured the Rot.
Besides, this one does what he says--he defeated Saben.
Besides, this one does what she says--she defeated Saben.
You're right. My lord, we will do as you say. We will forgive and tell others to do the same.
